function.name: prompt_user
function.description: function to ask the user for input or to ask the user for permission.

prompt_to_user.description: the prompt to give to the user

function.name: await_agent_completion
function.description: function to await the completion of the desired agent's response.

agent_name.description: the name of the agent to be monitored for completion.

conversation_id.description: the ID of the conversation that the awaited results will be added to.

function.name: initiate_connection
function.description: function to initiate a message connection with the selected agent in the swarm.

target.description: the name of the agent to initiate message connection with.

function.name: add_agent_message
function.description: function to add a message to the target agent's short term memory.

agent_name.description: the name of the agent to send a message to.

message.description: the message to send to the selected agent.

function.name: create_run
function.description: function to create a run, and optionally to aggregate the other agent's communications with the current agent (you).

target.description: the name of the agent to create a run with.

aggregate_messages.description: Boolean value that determines whether the chats from other agents will be given to the current agent (you). Choose True to aggregate messages.

agents.description: Array of agent names to be included in the run.

function.name: check_agent_status
function.description: function to check the status of the selected agent's completion.

target.description: the name of the agent to check on the status of.
